Game.Name: Sega Top Five (Brazil)
Game.plot: Sega Top Five is a compilation of games for the Sega Mega Drive, released exclusively in Brazil in 1997. It was followed by a similar Brazil-exclusive compilation named Sega Top Ten.
Game.Notes: Sega Top Five is a compilation of games for the Sega Mega Drive, released exclusively in Brazil in 1997. It was followed by a similar Brazil-exclusive compilation named Sega Top Ten. Games included: Flicky Sega Soccer Shadow Dancer: The Secret of Shinobi Super Monaco GP Super Thunder Blade
